name.baseName: Aluminum electrolysis carbon anode production ; carbon anode ; prebaked ; petroleum coke
铝电解碳阳极生产 ; 碳阳极 ; 预焙 ; 石油焦

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The anode production system consists of coarse crushing workshop, calcining workshop, molding workshop, baking workshop and auxiliary workshop. The “cradle to gate” system boundary included raw material transportation, coarse crushing process, calcination process, calcining pollutant treatment process, vibration transport process, sieving and grinding process, mixing molding process, roasting process, roasting pollutant treatment process, defective products broken process.

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The anode production system consists of coarse crushing workshop, calcining workshop, molding workshop, baking workshop and auxiliary workshop. The “cradle to gate” system boundary included raw material transportation, coarse crushing process, calcination process, calcining pollutant treatment process, vibration transport process, sieving and grinding process, mixing molding process, roasting process, roasting pollutant treatment process, defective products broken process.
technology.technologicalApplicability: The commercial prebaked carbon anodes produced through this industrial process are mainly used in the aluminum smelting industry. Prebaked anodes are essential in the process of electrolytic aluminum production, acting as the key component in the electrolysis cell that facilitates the chemical reaction necessary to reduce aluminum oxide to pure aluminum.
通过这一工业过程生产的商用预焙碳阳极主要用于铝冶炼行业。预焙阳极是电解铝生产过程中的关键部件，作为电解槽中促进将氧化铝还原为纯铝必要化学反应的关键组成部分。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The background data of petroleum coke and coal pitch were LCI data in the Ecoinvent 3 database. The petroleum coke and coal pitch were supplied by several suppliers, and the production data cannot be provided by prebaked anode companies. As a result, the petroleum coke and coal pitch data in the database were adopted in this study instead of specific production data. At the same time, the background data of ammonia, tap water and lime were drawn from the Ecoinvent 3 database. The data of caustic soda came from the literature, the data of petroleum coke, and the LCI data of electric power were drawn from the literature. In the prebaked anode production process, the supply of natural gas in the baking link came from the local natural gas pipeline in Jinan. In the Ecoinvent 3 database, the LCI data of ordinary natural gas were selected in this study. According to the field investigation, the transportation distance of petroleum coke, pitch and metallurgical coke used in this study was 150 km, 120 km, and 200 km respectively. It is assumed in this study that the load capacity of each transport truck was 20 ton, the average power was 220 kWh, the main energy consumption in the transportation stage was fuel consumption, and the energy consumption per unit of road transportation was 1836 KJ/(t. km). The total consumption of diesel oil in the transport phase was 74.22 L. In this study, the average emission coefficient of unit fuel consumption was used as the standard for the exhaust emission of vehicles to transport the raw materials.

石油焦和煤沥青的背景数据是 Ecoinvent 3 数据库中的 LCI 数据。石油焦和煤沥青由多家供应商提供，预焙阳极公司无法提供生产数据。因此，本研究采用了数据库中的石油焦和煤沥青数据，而不是具体的生产数据。同时，氨水、自来水和石灰的背景数据来自 Ecoinvent 3 数据库。烧碱的数据来自文献，石油焦的数据和电力的 LCI 数据来自文献。在预焙阳极生产过程中，焙烧环节的天然气供应来自济南当地的天然气管道。在 Ecoinvent 3 数据库中，本研究选取了普通天然气的 LCI 数据。根据实地调查，本研究使用的石油焦、沥青和冶金焦的运输距离分别为 150 公里、120 公里和 200 公里。本研究假设每辆运输车的载重量为 20 吨，平均功率为 220 千瓦时，运输阶段的主要能耗为燃油消耗，单位公路运输能耗为 1836 KJ/（吨/公里）。本研究以单位油耗的平均排放系数作为原材料运输车辆尾气排放的标准。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Tang, Y. et al. Environmental and economic impacts assessment of prebaked anode production process: A case study in Shandong Province, China. Journal of Cleaner Production 196, 1657–1668 (2018).
Tang, Y. et al. Environmental and economic impacts assessment of prebaked anode production process: A case study in Shandong Province, China. Journal of Cleaner Production 196, 1657–1668 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: A company in Jinan was selected as the research subject in this study. Currently, half of the world's prebaked anode products are produced in China. The production of the commercial prebaked anode in Shandong Province was 5.21 million tons in 2016, which accounts for 59% of the total production in China. As one of the large company in Shandong Province, the company chosen for case study can produce 400 thousand tons of prebaked anode annually. The production process is also typical for prebaked anode production in China.
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this dataset, it is important to note that it only includes the 'cradle to gate' aspects of the prebaked anode production including raw material transportation, various processing stages, and pollutant treatment, without consideration for the downstream use or end-of-life stages. The LCI data from Ecoinvent 3 serves as background data and the transport distances for key materials are specific to the case study. For broader LCA studies, users should adjust the transport distances according to their geographical context. The environmental impacts of infrastructure and facility construction are negligible for the purpose of assessing impacts per ton of prebaked anode produced and thus not included in the dataset. Users should not consider the transport of water, natural gas, ammonia, sodium hydroxide, and lime due to their much shorter transport distances and minimal environmental impact in this specific case study.

使用这个数据集时，需要注意它仅包括预焙阳极生产的‘摇篮到大门’阶段，包括原材料运输、不同的处理阶段和污染物处理，没有考虑下游使用或生命周期末期阶段。Ecoinvent 3的生命周期库存数据作为背景数据，关键材料的运输距离是特定于案例研究的。对于更广泛的生命周期评估研究，用户应根据他们的地理环境调整运输距离。基础设施和设施建设的环境影响对于评估每吨预焙阳极生产的影响是可以忽略的，因此没有包括在数据集中。由于运输距离短及环境影响小，在这个特定的案例研究中，用户不应考虑水、天然气、氨、氢氧化钠和石灰的运输。

completeness.common:other: This study only took into account the long-distance transport process of petroleum coke, pitch, and metallurgical coke. Water came from the urban water supply system. Natural gas was drawn from the pipeline. Ammonia, sodium hydroxide and lime were purchased locally. The transportation distance of water, nature gas, ammonia, sodium hydroxide and lime is much shorter than that of petroleum coke, pitch, and metallurgical coke. The environmental impact of less than 1% can be ignored. Therefore, the transport process of these elements was not considered in this study. In addition, in the long-term production process, the environmental pollution derived from infrastructure development and facility construction was relatively low compared to that of 1ton prebaked anode, which was not taken into consideration.
本研究仅考虑了石油焦、沥青和冶金焦的长途运输过程。水来自城市供水系统。天然气来自管道。氨、氢氧化钠和石灰在当地购买。与石油焦、沥青和冶金焦相比，水、天然气、氨、氢氧化钠和石灰的运输距离要短得多。对环境的影响小于 1%，可以忽略不计。因此，本研究未考虑这些元素的运输过程。此外，在长期生产过程中，与 1 吨预焙阳极相比，基础设施开发和设施建设所产生的环境污染相对较低，因此未考虑在内。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Calcium sulphate (by-product in Roasting pollutant treatment process)

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: sodium hydroxide, without water, in 50% solution state

exchange.generalComment: natural gas input in roasting process
